peril.views.slick.board

Class SlickArmy

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.board.SlickArmy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public final class SlickArmy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The visual representation of a ModelArmy. This observes the ModelArmy and will update upon model changes.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Observer, ModelArmy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Font collapsedFont
      The Font that will be used to display the collapsed strength of the SlickArmy.
      private boolean expanded
      Whether of not this SlickArmy will be displayed in its expanded view or not.
      private Font expandedFont
      The Font that will be used to display the number of each unit in this SlickArmy.
      ModelArmy model
      The ModelArmy this SlickArmy will observe and display.
      private static int PADDING
      The padding between SlickUnits in the expanded view.
      private ModelUnit selected
      Holds the currently selected ModelUnit.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SlickArmy(ModelArmy model)
      Constructs a new SlickArmy using an ModelArmy.

      Draws the oval that is displayed behind the ModelArmy on a SlickCountry.
      private void drawCollapsed(Frame frame, Point position, SlickPlayer ruler)
      Draws this SlickArmy in it collapsed view which just shows the strength of the army.
      void drawExpanded(Frame frame, Point position, SlickPlayer ruler, SlickModelView view)
      Draws this SlickArmy in it expanded view which shows all the different types of SlickUnit in this SlickArmy and how many of them there are.

      • update

        Updates this SlickArmy from the ModelArmy.

      • expand

        public void expand()
        Causes this SlickArmy to be displayed in its expanded view.

      • collapse

        public void collapse()
        Causes this SlickArmy to be displayed in its collapsed view.

      • drawExpanded

        public void drawExpanded(Frame frame,
                         Point position,
                         SlickPlayer ruler,
                         SlickModelView view)
        Draws this SlickArmy in it expanded view which shows all the different types of SlickUnit in this SlickArmy and how many of them there are.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame that will display the SlickArmy to the user.
        position - The Point of the centre of the SlickArmy.
        ruler - The SlickPlayer that rules this SlickArmy.
        view - The SlickModelView that allows the ModelUnits in the ModelArmy to be mapped to their SlickArmy counterparts.

      • draw

        public void draw(Frame frame,
                 Point position,
                 SlickPlayer ruler,
                 SlickModelView view)
        Draws this SlickArmy at a position on screen.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame that will display the SlickArmy to the user.
        position - The Point of the centre of the SlickArmy.
        ruler - The SlickPlayer that rules this SlickArmy.
        view - The SlickModelView that allows the ModelUnits in the ModelArmy to be mapped to their SlickArmy counterparts.

      • isExpanded

        public boolean isExpanded()
        Retrieves whether or not this SlickArmy is expanded or not.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not this SlickArmy is expanded or not.

      • isClicked

        public boolean isClicked(Point click,
                         Point armyPosition,
                         SlickModelView view)
        Processes a click on this SlickArmy. If a SlickUnit in this army is clicked it will be selected.
        Parameters:
        click - The Point position of the click.
        armyPosition - The Point position of this SlickArmy.
        view - The SlickModelView that will allow the retrieval of the SlickUnits
        Returns:
        Whether or not a SlickUnit was selected or not.

      • rePositionUnits

        private void rePositionUnits(Point position,
                             SlickModelView view)
        Repositions the SlickUnits that make up this SlickArmy so that they are correctly drawn on screen.
        Parameters:
        position - The Point position of this SlickArmy.
        view - The SlickModelView that allows the ModelUnits in the ModelArmy to be mapped to their SlickArmy counterparts.

      • drawCollapsed

        private void drawCollapsed(Frame frame,
                           Point position,
                           SlickPlayer ruler)
        Draws this SlickArmy in it collapsed view which just shows the strength of the army.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame that will display the SlickArmy to the user.
        position - The Point of the centre of the SlickArmy.
        ruler - The SlickPlayer that rules this SlickArmy.

      • drawArmyOval

        private void drawArmyOval(Point position,
                          int strength,
                          Frame frame)
        Draws the oval that is displayed behind the ModelArmy on a SlickCountry.
        Parameters:
        position - The Point of the centre of the SlickArmy.
        strength - The strength of the ModelArmy
        frame - The Frame that will display the SlickArmy to the user.

      • drawUnit

        private void drawUnit(Frame frame,
                      SlickUnit unit)
        Draws a ModelUnit on screen at a specified Point position.
        Parameters:
        unit - The SlickUnit to be drawn.
        frame - The Frame that will display the SlickArmy to the user.

        Updates the selected SlickUnit.
        Parameters:
